AnotherEntry.name: AnotherEntry
AnotherEntry.description:
This is just another entry to simulate that you can add facets also on JSON
schema defined types. Although you can only add documentation-based facets.

secured.name: secured
secured.usage:
This trait can be used to apply an access token query parameter
to any resources or HTTP methods.

oauth_1_0.name: oauth_1_0
oauth_1_0.description: OAuth 1.0 continues to be supported for all API requests, but OAuth 2.0 is now preferred.

oauth_2_0.name: oauth_2_0
oauth_2_0.description: Dropbox supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests.

access_token.name: access_token
access_token.description:
Used to send a valid OAuth 2 access token. Do not use with
the "Authorization" header.

Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description:
Used to send a valid OAuth 2 access token. Do not use
with the "access_token" query string parameter.

responses.description:
Bad or expired token. This can happen if the user or Dropbox
revoked or expired an access token. To fix, re-authenticate
the user.

Bad OAuth request (wrong consumer key, bad nonce, expired
timestamp...). Unfortunately, re-authenticating the user won't help here.

custom_scheme.name: custom_scheme
custom_scheme.description: A custom security scheme for authenticating requests.

SpecialToken.name: SpecialToken
SpecialToken.description: Used to send a custom token.

specification.title: World Music API
specification.description: This is an example of a music API.

resources.description: Access to all songs inside the music world library.

application/xml.name: application/xml
type:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
  elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified">
  <xs:element name="song">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="artist" type="xs:string" />
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

documentation.title: Getting Started
documentation.content: This is a getting started guide for the World Music API.
